description: Display data from the Proxmox host and hosted VM's and Containers.

targets.query: SELECT mean("memused") / 1073741824, mean("memtotal") / 1073741824 FROM "memory" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last(uptime) AS "uptime" FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND ("nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND time > (now() - 10m)  AND uptime > 0 GROUP BY "host" limit 1
SELECT last(uptime) AS "uptime" FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'lxc') AND ("nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND time > (now() - 10m) AND uptime > 0 GROUP BY "host" limit 1
SELECT mean("memused")/mean("memtotal") * 100 FROM "memory" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(null)
SELECT last("cpu") FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu' AND "nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host", "nodename" fill(null)
SELECT (mean("mem")/last(maxmem))*100  FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "nodename" fill(null)
SELECT last("cpu") FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("mem")/last(maxmem))*100 FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'lxc') AND ("nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "node", "host", "nodename" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND ("instance" =~ /^vmbr*/ OR "instance" = 'enp2s0')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("transmit"), 10s) FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND ("instance" =~ /^vmbr*/ OR "instance" = 'enp2s0')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(null)
select last("used") / last("total") from system where host=~/^$storage$/ AND nodename=~/^$server$/ group by host,nodename fill(0.5)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host WHERE object='nodes'
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host WHERE object='nodes'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host WHERE object='storages'
list.name: storage
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host WHERE object='storages'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nics WITH KEY=~/^instance$/ WHERE instance !~ /^veth/ AND instance !~ /^tap/ AND instance !~ /^fw/ AND instance != 'lo'
list.name: interfaces
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nics WITH KEY=~/^instance$/ WHERE instance !~ /^veth/ AND instance !~ /^tap/ AND instance !~ /^fw/ AND instance != 'lo'

title: Proxmox
